Class Invoice

java.lang.Object
entity.EntityObject
entity.billing.Invoice
public class Invoice extends EntityObject
Represents an invoice with details such as customer ID, appointment ID, total amount, service fee, tax, balance, payment status, issue date, and status of the invoice. This class is used to manage and display invoice information.

    Enum representing the status of the invoice.

  • Constructor Details

    • Invoice

      public Invoice()
      Default constructor for Invoice. Initializes an empty Invoice object.

    • Invoice

      public Invoice(String invoiceId, String customerId, String apptId, double serviceFee, double totalAmount, double taxRate, LocalDateTime issueDate)
      Constructs an Invoice with specified details. The total amount is calculated as the sum of the base amount and the service fee. The total payable is calculated by applying the tax rate to the total amount.
      Parameters:
      invoiceId - The ID of the invoice.
      customerId - The ID of the customer to whom the invoice is issued.
      apptId - The ID of the appointment related to the invoice.
      serviceFee - The service fee associated with the invoice.
      totalAmount - The total amount before tax and service fee.
      taxRate - The tax rate applied to the total amount.
      issueDate - The issue date of the invoice.
